body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Carter and the customer's name is Elizabeth Ramirez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joe Carter, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Joe! I'm Elizabeth Ramirez. I've been looking for a new motorcycle but I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Elizabeth. Choosing the right motorcycle can be a big decision! Can I ask what kind of riding you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm thinking about a cruiser, something comfortable for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Cruisers are perfect for long-distance comfort. Before we proceed, could I get your phone number for follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that! Now, could you also provide your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one zero two zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! With that information, I can help you find the best options available. Our currently available models are fantastic!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's wonderful to hear. I appreciate your help, Joe!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Elizabeth! I'm here to help. If you have any more questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
